metadata.title: CVE-2013-7323 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
python-gnupg before 0.3.5 allows context-dependent attackers to executearbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7323` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-gnupg - 0.3.6-1
python3-gnupg - 0.3.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-gnupg package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-1').
